stepAssociations.description: List of steps that make up the transformation pipeline. In a POST this will be used for attaching the steps to the pipeline. In a PUT this is ignored.

position.description: The steps position in the sequence of steps, starting with number 1.

id.description: The step's numeric id. In a POST it is used for looking up the step and attaching it.

name.description: An alternative to the ID for look-up and attachment. Used in a POST if no ID is present.
